SEARCH
Package seng201.team53.game.map

Class GameMap

java.lang.Object
seng201.team53.game.map.GameMap
public class GameMap extends Object
This class represents a map in the game. It stores information about the map grid, tiles and placed towers A map consists of a 2D array of tiles, where each tile represents a specific location on the map

  • Constructor Details

    • GameMap

      public GameMap(String name, Tile[][] tiles, int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY)
      Constructs a new Map with the specified properties
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the map
      tiles - The matrix of map tiles
      startX - The paths starting grid x coordinate
      startY - The paths starting grid y coordinate
      endX - The paths ending grid x co-ordinate
      endY - The paths ending grid y co-ordinate

  • Method Details

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns:
      The name of the map

    • getTileAt

      public Tile getTileAt(int tileX, int tileY) throws TileNotFoundException
      Retrieves the tile object at the specified coordinates on the map grid
      Parameters:
      tileX - The X coordinate of the tile on the grid (zero-based indexing)
      tileY - The Y coordinate of the tile on the grid (zero-based indexing)
      Returns:
      The tile object at the given coordinates, or null if the coordinates are outside the map bounds
      Throws:
      TileNotFoundException - If the requested tile coordinates are outside the valid range of the map

    • getTileFromScreenPosition

      public Tile getTileFromScreenPosition(int screenX, int screenY) throws TileNotFoundException
      Retrieves the tile object at the specified coordinates on the map grid
      Parameters:
      screenX - The X coordinate of the screen (in pixels)
      screenY - The Y coordinate of the screen (in pixels)
      Returns:
      The tile object at the given coordinates, or null if the coordinates are outside the map bounds
      Throws:
      TileNotFoundException

    • getPolylinePath

      public javafx.scene.shape.Polyline getPolylinePath()
      Returns:
      The polyline version of the complete path

    • calculatePathDuration

      public javafx.util.Duration calculatePathDuration(float velocity)
      Calculates the duration it takes to travel the path at a given velocity
      Parameters:
      velocity - the speed in tiles per second which the path should be travelled at
      Returns:
      the duration object representing the time it will take to travel the path

    • getTowersProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.MapProperty<Tower,Tile> getTowersProperty()
      Retrieves the towers property that maps towers to their tiles This property is observable, meaning it can be watched for changes
      Returns:
      The observable MapProperty of towers to tiles

    • getTowers

      public Collection<Tower> getTowers()
      Returns:
      Retrieves the collect of towers currently placed on the map

      Adds a tower to the map
      Parameters:
      tower - The tower object to be placed on the map
      tile - The tile object where the tower is to be placed
